SEARCH
Package nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.api.animatedblock

Interface IAnimatedBlockHook

public interface IAnimatedBlockHook
Represents a hook for IAnimatedBlocks.
Author:
Pim

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    getName()
     
    default void
    onBlockPlace()
    Fires after the block has been placed back into the world when the animation ends.
    default void
    onDeleteOriginalBlock()
    Fires after the original block that serves as template for the animated block has been removed from the world.
    default void
    onDie()
    Fires after an animated block has died.
    default void
    onMoved(Vector3Dd newPosition)
    Fires after this animated block has been moved.
    default void
    onRespawn()
    Fires after an animated block has been respawned.
    default void
    onSpawn()
    Fires after an animated block has been spawned.
    default void
    onTeleport(Vector3Dd from, Vector3Dd to)
    Fires after an animated block has been teleported.
    default void
    postTick()
    Fires right after a tick is processed.
    default void
    preTick()
    Fires right before a tick is processed.

  • Method Details

    • getName

      String getName()
      Returns:
      The name of this hook to use for logging purposes.

    • onSpawn

      default void onSpawn()
      Fires after an animated block has been spawned. Respawning is not counted. See onRespawn() for that.

      This may be called asynchronously.

    • onRespawn

      default void onRespawn()
      Fires after an animated block has been respawned.

    • onDie

      default void onDie()
      Fires after an animated block has died.

    • onDeleteOriginalBlock

      default void onDeleteOriginalBlock()
      Fires after the original block that serves as template for the animated block has been removed from the world.

    • onBlockPlace

      default void onBlockPlace()
      Fires after the block has been placed back into the world when the animation ends.

    • onTeleport

      default void onTeleport(Vector3Dd from, Vector3Dd to)
      Fires after an animated block has been teleported.

      This may be called asynchronously.

      Parameters:
      from - The position of the animated block before the teleport.
      to - The position the animated block was teleported to.

    • onMoved

      default void onMoved(Vector3Dd newPosition)
      Fires after this animated block has been moved.

      This may happen either because of a teleport or because of tick-based movement.

      This may be called asynchronously.

      Parameters:
      newPosition - The position the animated block was moved to.

    • preTick

      default void preTick()
      Fires right before a tick is processed.

    • postTick

      default void postTick()
      Fires right after a tick is processed.
